title: Let’s Keep Going! Aichi!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>I’m glad we came. I had a blast.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What are you talking about, Mia-san! There’s still more fun to be had today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s right! Let’s keep having fun today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>What do you wanna eat, Mia-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hm, I want to eat everything everyone mentioned yesterday. Like miso katsu, miso nikomi udon, hitsumabushi, chicken wings...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>It’s hard to choose, isn’t it? They all sound delicious......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>This is tough. We can’t possibly eat everything!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>...Then let’s ask everyone! And if there’s something we can’t eat today, we’ll come back to eat it! And with everyone next time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>That’s it! Great idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Then let’s learn about even more food today for next time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
